snippet.title: Function to Add two numbers
snippet.content: function add(a, b) { return a + b; }

snippet.title: Function to Subtract two numbers
snippet.content: function subtract(a, b) { return a - b; }

snippet.title: Function to Multiply two numbers
snippet.content: function multiply(a, b) { return a * b; }

snippet.title: Function to Divide two numbers
snippet.content: function divide(a, b) { return a / b; }
